data.title: Visit Magasin du Nord Aarhus in Denmark
data.meta_description: Visit the exclusive Magasin du Nord shopping mall in Aarhus.
data.text:
Visit the exclusive Magasin du Nord shopping mall in Aarhus.

You will find Magasin du Nord in the heart of Aarhus.

Throughout the mall you find a wide selection of some of the world’s most exclusive and modern brands.

By passing through the women’s, men’s and children’s department, you will find international brands such as Hugo Boss and Tommy Hilfiger or Scandinavian brands such as Filippa K or By Malene Birger.

It is a very good idea to visit the home department, which offers a large selection of both classic and modern Scandinavian design as well as a variety of international products.

At Magasin you can also treat yourself with high-end beauty and perfume products or buy wine and other tasteful delicacies.
